title: Saying "Kill steal" should be punishable
body: All these kids using it, it is really annoying. And before commenting "LMAO SKRUB GROW BALLS" or "LMAO GROW A SPINE YOU KID" just think about how annoying it is when you and another person are fighting the same enemy, but your auto attack kills the enemy and that goddamn ally says "ks noob". Also I know I can mute them but it's still tilting when I look at the chat and see "ks" before it disappears from other messages.

replies.body: There's a point where you just laugh at them instead of getting riled up. Tell them "you mean Kill Secured" and just ignore or mute them.
Well I say that but right before I mute them they say " Kill steal noob "

People who say "KS" or "Kill steal noob" are most likely 10 year old kids dude, are your seriously going to get hurt from what a 10 year old says?  Are you going to get upset and stir up a word war with them?  Ignore-Mute-move on. 
  If you're a 10 year old or younger or still in your "teen" stage and you see people say that s$it then just do the same thing as stated above.  Once you do without causing anymore salt or reacting to that stuff it means you're growing up and maturing while they aren't.  
   Happy Holidays and better luck dealing with that stuff in the future.

I can't even get behind reporting it, it's just a tiny outburst of frustration, not a personal attack. If they escalate their behavior, of course that would be something different, and obviously if they do this frequently it could be punishable.
Dude what.

In all fairness, it really depends on the situation. If you're Blitzcrank and your ADC is Vayne, if the enemy has low 300 health and Vayne has 2/3 silver bolts procd and tumbles, then as her AA is flying through the air you use your ult... you're an asshole and should be banned yourself.

On the contrary, same situation, if a low health enemy is running from Blitz/Vayne and you, the jungler Xin, come stop the escape, then screw that noob Blitz/Vayne combo that couldn't secure the kill.

Ignore it. It isn't offensive, and it'll only get a rise out of them if you take offense at such an innane statement. They're clearly tilting, and if you make a fuss about it, it gets worse. I just say nothing and go on, and generally it all disappates.

Just reply back, "I agree, Kill secured".

But in all seriousness, if you feel like someone did something reportable, report them. Riot can't preemptively ban players before they show annoying behavior.

Though as a tip for the game, if there's a low health enemy that has no hope of escape nor hope of killing any teammates, it's generally a good idea to let someone on your team that scales well with items kill them. Note, I am not saying that this was the situation that you experienced.

If you feel like killing the enemy quickly was the best option, mentally dismiss their opinion on "kill steal", it's just the ramblings of someone who's salty.

There is a very easy solution for this problem:

If you got a kill(steal) instead of an assist: "same gold for the team".
If you got a kill instead of nothing at all: "more gold for the team".

Both are guaranteed to make them flip out and start smashing their face against their keyboard, and typically stops further salting in chat, except in the most pathetically stupid cases.

In some rare situations an ADC who got KSed by their support will simply ragequit or sit at base; this is a case of "nothing of value was lost", because someone this unstable and bratty would feed or ragequit before 20 no matter what you try do to make them happy.
